page.title: 17TILEHURST STATION
page.content: The {station master }did not know the exact number of trains which pass a day. He said, however,that {2} intercity sleepers passed a day and about{800}people pass through the station. It is a commuter station which means it is mainly used by people who go to work.Only{2}people work there. they are in the ticket office. Most of the trains are through trains and do not stop at the station. The most expensive train journey is { {Â£230 }and it goes to Wick {(1st {class).}Sometimes steam trains go through to Reading.The latest one was on the {1st of June 1985}it came from Didcot.
